import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Cancel ticket"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/cancel"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Cancels a ticket, moving it to a canceled/closed state. Use this endpoint when a ticket should be terminated without resolution (e.g., duplicate, no longer needed, submitted in error).

**Prerequisites**
- Optionally retrieve close reasons from [GET /api/v1.0/resolutions/close-reason-types](/docs/api/tickets/get-close-reason-types) to specify a cancellation reason

**Workflow Example**
1. List close reasons: [GET /api/v1.0/resolutions/close-reason-types](/docs/api/tickets/get-close-reason-types) → select appropriate `CloseReasonTypeId`
2. Cancel ticket: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/cancel](/docs/api/tickets/cancel-ticket) with optional reason and comments

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the ticket to cancel","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":false,"description":"Optional cancel options including close reason identifier.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Options for canceling a ticket, including an optional close reason.","properties":{"CloseReasonTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Optional identifier for the close reason type. Obtain available values from site settings via [GET /api/v1.0/sites/{siteUrl}](/docs/api/sites/get-site-by-url) and read `Item.Settings.CloseReasonTypes[]`.","nullable":true,"x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"getSiteByUrl","endpoint":"GET /api/v1.0/sites/{siteUrl}","responseField":"Item.Settings.CloseReasonTypes[].CloseReasonTypeId"},"example":"c98ae44e-ada0-4ae7-ae30-817785c00004"}},"example":{"CloseReasonTypeId":"c98ae44e-ada0-4ae7-ae30-817785c00004"},"title":"TicketCancelOptions"},"example":{"CloseReasonTypeId":"c98ae44e-ada0-4ae7-ae30-817785c00004"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
